title: 'Show Your Face to the Orb': Eyes-on With Sam Altman's Worldcoin
description: In former East Berlin, Sam Altman’s Worldcoin is scanning irises for tokens—under the watchful eye of European privacy watchdogs.

title: Coinbase eyes Bitcoin Lightning Network integration, says CEO Brian Armstrong
description:
Brian Armstrong, Coinbase’s CEO, said the exchange was working to integrate Bitcoin (BTC) Lightning Network (LN) as part of efforts to drive cryptocurrency payments in the world, according to an Aug. 2 tweet. Armstrong made this statement in response to a tweet from Jack, Twitter’s co-founder, who questioned why Coinbase was ignoring the implementation of […]

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Technical Analysis: BTC Surges Towards $30,000, Following Latest Microstrategy Filing
description: Bitcoin moved towards the $30,000 level on Aug. 2, as markets reacted to the latest filings by Michael Saylor’s Microstrategy. title: Abracadabra looking to hike loan interest rate by 200% due to Curve exposure
description: Abracadabra Money, a cross-blockchain lending platform, has proposed to raise the interest rate on its existing loans to address potential risks related to its exposure to Curve (CRV). This proposal has sparked varied responses within the community, with some expressing concerns about altering loan conditions while others view it as a strategic move to mitigate ... Read more

title: Tezos (XTZ) Price Prediction 2023-2030: Will XTZ reach $1.5 Soon?
description:
What is Tezos (XTZ)? Tezos is a generic and self-amending crypto-ledger that can instantiate any blockchain-based ledger. The operations of a regular blockchain are implemented as a purely functional module abstracted into a shell responsible for network operations. Bitcoin, Ethereum, Cryptonote, etc. can all be represented within Tezos by implementing the proper interface to the […]

The post Tezos (XTZ) Price Prediction 2023-2030: Will XTZ reach $1.5 Soon? appeared first on Coin Edition.
